section.name: Mevenide Update
section.p: To install Mevenide through the Eclipse Update Manager, create an Update Site [1] pointing to : http://mevenide.codehaus.org/release/eclipse/update/site.xml

and just follow instructions. 3.0.x and 3.1M1 users should use :
http://mevenide.codehaus.org/release/eclipse/update/3.0/

If this procedure it not suitable, you can download a big zip archive containing the feature and all the plugins. You just need to unzip it into your Eclipse install directory. Please let us know if youd prefer to have a local install update site packaged instead of just plugins and feature archives.

div.p: [1] Help > Software Updates > Find and Install... > Search for new features to install > Add update site...
